sections.heading: control signal, defined.Traffic control signal shall mean any signal, whether manually, electrically, or mechanically operated, by which traffic is alternately directed to stop and permitted to proceed

sections.text:
60-671.Traffic control signal, defined.

Traffic control signal shall mean any signal, whether manually, electrically, or mechanically operated, by which traffic is alternately directed to stop and permitted to proceed.

SourceLaws 1993, LB 370, ยง 167.
